lead_paragraph: Republican Senator John McCain said on Sunday the United States could only improve its relations with Russia by taking a tough stance with President Putin, calling for stronger sanctions against Moscow.
snippet: Republican Senator John McCain said on Sunday the United States could only improve its relations with Russia by taking a tough stance with President Putin, calling for stronger sanctions against Moscow....

headline.main: Senator McCain Says U.S. 'Must Stand Up to Vladimir Putin'
headline.print_headline: Senator McCain Says U.S. 'Must Stand Up to Vladimir Putin'
